Authentication views¶

Views for authentication. Basically supports login/logout.

authentication.views.get_access_token(request)[source]¶

Function to retrieve plaid access token

authentication.views.login(request)[source]¶

Dummy function to render login page

authentication.views.logout(request)[source]¶

Function to logout

authentication.views.setup_bank(request)[source]¶

Function to serve bank setup page
